reviews.review_msg: Noel's exams are basic. Participation marks are a big part of your grade. He asks cryptic open-ended questions with specific answers that are hard to guess, but you get used to it. The readings and course content make up for somewhat lackluster lectures. You could do a lot worse than a prof that's a little boring. The workload is not heavy.

Hard work pays off in his classes. Lots of readings, but from a very good selection. He is funny and witty. Lectures are never boring. Very respectful and approachable. Lectures are engaging. He loves what he does and his energy is always great! So is his music playlists!
